name: Nifty Lifty II - In the 21st Century?
name_original: Nifty Lifty II - In the 21st Century?
description: This is a fan remake/ sequel to Nifty Lifty, attempting to capture the wonder of playing the game back in the 80s. Further updates will follow- this is BETA so much appreciate all feedback (be nice, its my first time :))
